column5: My brother and I leave tomorrow to fish Lac Seul with Ben and this arrives today in the mail.     Being the good brother that I am, I'm willing to let my little brother catch that one.
Nice camera work. Looks like a six footer
That sounds like one HECK!! Of a trip to look forward to! I'd say "have fun" but that is really unecessary haha.
If that doesn't get you pumped. That's a beauty
I am sure Ben will hook you and Jim up with a big girl!!  Good Luck
I guess you can give up on sleeping the next few nights!!  Counting jumping muskeys  What a monster Ben.  Congrats on the spread.
Wow!  How small is the guy in the pic?
Good luck on your trip!
that one may be going 58-60
Take all of your warm clothes out on the lake with you.  Good luck with some huge fish.
Ha Ha, I call it the 'in-fisherman' hold. Reach toward the camera and make the fish look huge.  Nice fish!
Id say that would set the mood....  fish porn!!
Nothing like fish pictures shot with a super-wide lens. Provided you keep your hands hidden, it makes any fish look like Moby Dick.
I don't care what kind of lense was used to capture that shot but knowing Ben that is still one hell of a fish.  I'd be tickled to death to be on my way to fish LS with Ben
Photoshopped!!!  Joking Bennie!  You're a slayer of fish in a world full of leviathans.  Props dood!  Another day at the office for ya!?!?!?
Stop hatin!!! That is a big fish people and I could care less how close you hold it or what camera you use.  It is a BIG FISH!  Enough said. Congrats
Im going to the french next weekend and that pic is gonna have me sleepwalkin. Good luck on your trip!
What a great trip that must be. Lac Seul with trapshooter as the guide for muskies. Apparently it is 3 degrees rain, snow and wind to add to the adventure.
I can tell you from first hand experience this summer that Ben is 100% professional and will do everyting in his power to put you on fish.
holy - what a tank....cant wait to check the mailbox  congrats Ben
